meanings.definition: A first or preliminary version of a device or product.
meanings.sent1: The engineer showed us the prototyped model of the new car.
meanings.sent2: The company is working on improving the prototyped design of the smartphone.
meanings.sent3: The team had a good laugh when the prototyped robot started dancing unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: Her room looked like a workshop with all the prototyped gadgets scattered around.
meanings.sent5: The students were amazed by the intricate details of the prototyped spaceship.

meanings.definition: To create a prototype of (a device or product).
meanings.sent1: The company prototyped the new software before launching it to the public.
meanings.sent2: She prototyped a new app that helps with time management.
meanings.sent3: The inventor prototyped a machine that automatically feeds pets.
meanings.sent4: He prototyped a solution that revolutionized the way we recycle.
meanings.sent5: The team prototyped a faster way to assemble the product.
